item.title: How to Survive The Sprint - Dev Leader Weekly 104
item.description: TL; DR: Raise awareness if sprint commitments are unreasonable Work should not come at the cost of your mental health Live stream will be Monday, August 4th at 7:00 PM Pacific on the Dev Leader Podcast YouTube channel! ðŸ‘€ YouTube News ðŸ‘€ Hey folks! I've been trying to get my other channels together so they can go live by the end of this week... And I've done it! If you are interested in C#, dotnet, and programming tutorials: https://youtube.

item.title: Weekly Recap - 2025-08-01
item.description: Like what you read or watched from the recap? I'd love if you helped share on Reddit or Daily.dev so others can see! Weekly Recap Upcoming Channel Changes ðŸ‘€ðŸ‘€ If you watch my YouTube channels, this is an important message about how my content will be organized going forward. My Engineering Role Feels Like Game of Thrones! A redditor from the ExperiencedDevs subreddit wrote that they feel like they are now caught up in political drama after a conversation with their manager.

item.title: Finding Mentors As A Junior Software Engineer - Dev Leader Weekly 103
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss how junior software engineers can approach finding mentorship! Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/07/26/finding-mentors-as-a-junior-software-engineer-dev-leader-weekly-103

item.title: Weekly Recap - 2025-07-25
item.description: Check out this week from Dev Leader! Here's a list including articles and videos on software engineering, career development, and programming in C#! Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/07/26/weekly-recap-20250725
